name: Formula Race Simulation
description:
Formula Race Simulation

You can now simulate formula championships. You can simulate single races or a full championship.

Features:

-Fully customizable simulations with 24 drivers going for the win

-Safety car

-Virtual safety car

-Red flags

-Pit stops(still in development)

Project is in active development, feedback and suggestions are appreciated, this is still a beta.

You can edit: 

Cars and drivers.

Championship's calendar. 

Points system.
